name: HERO 250
description:
An evil portal has invaded earth and it's up to you, the hero, to destroy the portal. Although, the portal is layered with 250 lives! Can you destroy all the layers before the world is fully invaded?

Player has to die and rebirth to gain more attack. The condition to get more attack is to beat the previous highest level reached in the new run.  THE MORE YOU DIE, THE STRONGER YOU GET!?

An infinite runner game made for the GD31 ART & GAME JAM event.
